content.section_one: SMS.Net is an SMS sender abstraction for .NET to decouple your SMS sending from the underlying provider, with access to different types of providers such as Twilio, MessageBird, Avochato, etc
content.section_two: RavenSMS is a custom-developed channel to allow developers to use their own phones to send SMS messages, without the need to purchase a subscription with a channel like Twilio.
